item.title: Oracle 19 Installation on RHEL 9.xx
item.description: Note: This Guide is Production Ready and can also be deployed on UAT Environment Servers. Prerequisites # yum install libnsl* -y yum update -y yum grouplist yum group install "Development Tools" Create Oracle Groups and add user # groupadd -g 3001 oinstall groupadd -g 3002 dba groupadd -g 3003 oper useradd -u 3001 -g oinstall -G dba,oper oracle passwd oracle Create the required directories # mkdir -p /u01/app/oracle/product/19.
